product.longDescription: The brilliant purple, 5–5 1/2" pods are eye-catching at market, easy to spot when harvesting, and add stunning color to salads when used raw. The pods do turn green when cooked. Upright plants are dark green with a purple tinge. Buff-colored seeds. Bush bean. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 1,360 seeds/lb. Packet: 175 seeds.

Royal Burgundy Organic Bean Seed

Royal Burgundy Organic Bean Seed

Product ID:2944G.112944G

The brilliant purple, 5–5 1/2" pods are eye-catching at market, easy to spot when harvesting, and add stunning color to salads when used raw. The pods do turn green when cooked. Upright plants are dark green with a purple tinge. Buff-colored seeds. Bush bean. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 1,360 seeds/lb. Packet: 175 seeds.
